# Extras: Going Even Further!

# Ideas for taking your exploration further!

Now that you've gotten a survey of all that the Particle ecosystem offers, why not try building a web, mobile, or cloud app to interact with your Particle device? Here are a couple of ideas to get your started, and links to some resources you might find helpful.

  1. Play with all those other Grove sensors in your Starter Kit and build something awesome!

  2. Create a Particle-powered mobile app using our iOS, Android, and Windows SDKs.

  3. Create a Particle-powered web app using the Particle JS library and your framework of choice, like Vue.js, React and Angular.

  4. Create a Particle-powered cross-platform mobile app using NativeScript and Vue.js.

  5. Explore additonal MATLAB analysis and visualization features with ThingSpeak.

# Particle Resources

  • Docs and Guides
  • Particle Community
  • Particle on Hackster.io

And If you build something with Particle, we'd love to see it, and share it with the world! Just mention us on Twitter (@particle) or Instagram (@particle_io). We can't wait to see what you build!

Help us improve this page!
